name: Introduction to Engineering
description: A basic introduction to the field of engineering, covering the fundamentals of engineering design, problem solving, and engineering theory.

name: Fundamentals of Industrial Engineering
description: A comprehensive introduction to the field of Industrial Engineering. This course introduces students to the concepts and principles of industrial engineering, including ergonomics, systems engineering, production planning and scheduling, and operations research.

name: Industrial Robotics
description: A comprehensive introduction to the field of industrial robotics. This course introduces students to the principles of robot design, programming, and operation for industrial applications.

name: Manufacturing Processes & Automation
description: An introduction to the principles of manufacturing processes and automation. This course covers topics such as machining, casting, injection molding, and automation in manufacturing.

name: Industrial Statistics
description: An introduction to the principles of industrial statistics. This course covers topics such as probability and statistics, process control, and quality assurance.
